TestInformation.Title: Open Porous Media
TestInformation.Description: This is a test of a DUNE (Distributed and Unified Numerics Environment) module called OPM Benchmarks from the Open Porous Media project. Open Porous Media is a set of open-source tools concerning simulation of flow and transport of fluids in porous media.

TestProfile.ExternalDependencies: build-utilities, subversion, git, libtool, openmpi-development, fortran-compiler, blas-development, lapack-development, boost-development, superlu
